name: Shadow Stalker
description:
Welcome to Shadow Stalker.

This game prototype was developed and coded by me
You can check out my portfolio here

The model for the Violet man was made by my good friend Patrick, You can find his LinkedIn here

Everything else is credited in game with links 

Please remember this is just a game concept, for a future game I want to plan. I'm prototyping a type of combat system I may make for a future game or this game, there have also been some concept sketches made by Patrick included on this page!

Thanks for playing!
